lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The portfolio will be managed on the London Stock Exchange by Korea Schroder Fund Management Ltd, a joint venture between <Schroders Plc> of Britain and four South Korean securities houses.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The offer is co-lead managed by Baring Brothers and Co Ltd of Britain and underwritten by 44 international banks and institutional investors, including eight South Korean securities firms.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the government is expected to announce guidelines for direct outside investment on the market by October, when foreigners holding convertible bonds issued by <Samsung Electronics Co Ltd> will have the option to trade them for shares.
